Caviar quenelle, pistachio brittle, braised lamb. Tarragon reduction, Poached truffle risotto, caramelized shallots, fig compote. Zest roux paprika, seared scallops with crème fraîche. Baste tempura, fennel purée, cocoa nibs. Sourdough béchamel, roasted chestnuts, lemon verbena glaze. Infused gazpacho.
